dsense.name: tutorial
dsense.guideword: (tuition: individual or small group) (大学导师)

example.eg: The two students attended a tutorial in their tutor's office.
This piece of software comes with a tutorial that shows you the basics of how to use it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 辅导材料, 书面材料

example.eg: We will have a tutorial session tomorrow to teach everyone the proper safety measures to take when using the new machine.
